TopicTitle: 1.0 Stock VTOL Mun Mining Vehicle and Space Hanger

Articles.Content:
Hi, This is my first craft i have posted here. I have made a space hanger and a Mun mining craft to dock inside the hanger. 

The mining craft has everything you need to mine . It can carry 1200 ore and also has an IRSU converter. It has 2441 m/s of delta-v so it is plenty to go from LKO to the surface of the Mun and back if you re-fuel on the surface.

The action groups 1 and 2 toggle between the vertical and horizontal thrusters. The thrusters are balanced for full tanks but the centre of mass doesn't shift much any way and it has SAS to compensate.

Here are some pictures of the mining craft.

![yWAgVri.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/yWAgVri.jpg)

![YaLp4Fb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/YaLp4Fb.jpg)

The mining vehicle can fit inside the hanger so it is useful to attach to a re-fueling station so you can transport ore back and forth. The Mining craft itself is self sufficient if it is re-fueled using the ore and it also has surplus ore for other re-fueling missions.

Here are some pictures of the hanger.

![nTxzgXD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nTxzgXD.jpg)

![EHjdpqH.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/EHjdpqH.jpg)

Here are some images of my attempts to launch the hanger and dock to my already in orbit station.

[http://imgur.com/a/N1Jnk](http://imgur.com/a/N1Jnk)

Here are the 100% stock craft. The hanger is more of an extra but feel free to take one. (Launch rocket not included)

[Hanger](https://www.dropbox.com/s/k11iyyvqpk9l77m/Mun%20Miner%20Hanger.craft?dl=0)

[Miner Craft](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0scvk2al11xd161/MunMiner%20I.craft?dl=0)

Let me know what you think, thanks!
